mapper.select: select pname from proteins where gene_symbol in (select pname from drug_protein where dname=#{drugname})

select mname from enzyme_metabolites where ename in (select DISTINCT pname from protein_enzyme where pname in (select pname from drug_protein where dname=#{drugname}) or pname_e in (select pname from drug_protein where dname=#{drugname})) or ename in (select DISTINCT pname_e from protein_enzyme where pname_e in (select pname from drug_protein where dname=#{drugname}) or pname in (select pname from drug_protein where dname=#{drugname}))
select pmid from drug_reference where dname=#{drugname}
